about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS GAME

WARNING: This game may trigger seizures for those with photosensitive epilepsy.

NOTE:

Stolen Life is a psychological horror game designed to immerse you in a tense and unsettling atmosphere. After hearing a mysterious scream, you discover a hidden, unfamiliar part of your own home. As you explore this strange new area, secrets begin to unravel, and you realize your wife has disappeared.

Game World:
Explore a dark space within your own home, where familiar surroundings turn into something unsettling.

Objective:
Piece together clues, uncover hidden truths, and search for your missing wife while facing the growing fear of what lies ahead.

Gameplay Features:

  • Exploration: Navigate through a series of interconnected rooms and hidden passages within your home. Each area is filled with environmental storytelling and subtle hints that guide you closer to the truth.

  • Puzzle Solving: Encounter a variety of puzzles that range from logic-based challenges to more abstract, psychological tests.

  • Atmospheric Horror: Experience a blend of psychological and environmental horror. The game uses sound, lighting, and visual effects to create a constant sense of unease and tension.

  • Narrative Depth: Uncover a rich, layered story through found documents, environmental clues, and eerie encounters.

  • Immersive Experience: The game features a first-person perspective, realistic graphics, and a haunting soundtrack that together create a deeply immersive experience.

Experience:
A psychological thriller that blends mystery and horror, keeping you on edge as reality and fear intertwine. The game challenges your nerves and perception, offering an intense, immersive experience.

name: Stolen Life
short_description: Stolen Life is a first-person psychological horror game. While working late, you hear a sudden scream from a coworker. Rushing to investigate, you find everyone is gone. As you search for answers, you uncover hidden secrets in your home and discover your wife is not home.
